summary.para: Contains classes and enumerations that are intended to localize the User Interface of DevExpress WinUI Controls.
Contains values corresponding to strings that can be localized.
Flip on Short Edge
None
Flip on Long Edge
Landscape
Automatically select
Manual feed
Portrait
All Pages
Collate
Copies:
Current
Custom
Print on both side
Location:
Orientation
Pages
Paper kind
Printers
Status:
Contains classes that implement the basic printing functionality. To use these classes in XAML code, add the xmlns:dxp=”using:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing” namespace reference.
When implemented by a class, enables it to print DevExpress controls.
For internal use.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.IPrintable.RightToLeftLayout

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to enable a right-to-left layout in the printed document.

member.value: true to enable the RTL layout; otherwise, false.

summary.para: The base class for links that enables printing functionality for WinUI controls.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.BottomMarginStyle

summary.para: Gets or sets the style applied to a bottom margin of the printed document.

member.value: The style applied to a bottom margin of the printed document.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.BottomMarginText

summary.para: Gets or sets the text of the document’s bottom margin.

member.value: The text of the document’s bottom margin.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.ColumnLayout

summary.para: Gets or sets the column layout.

member.value: The enumeration value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.ColumnWidth

summary.para: Gets or sets the width of a single column.

member.value: The width of a single column.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.Landscape

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the printed page orientation is landscape.

member.value: true if the printed page orientation is landscape; false if the printed page orientation is portrait.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.PageFooterStyle

summary.para: Gets or sets the style applied to a footer of the printed page.

member.value: The style applied to a footer of the printed page.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.PageFooterText

summary.para: Gets or sets the text of the page’s footer.

member.value: The text of the page’s footer.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.PageHeaderStyle

summary.para: Gets or sets the style applied to a header of the printed page.

member.value: The style applied to a header of the printed page.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.PageHeaderText

summary.para: Gets or sets the text of the page’s header.

member.value: The text of the page’s header.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.PrintReportFooterAtBottom

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the report footer is printed at the bottom of each page, or only after the report content.

member.value: true to always print the report footer at the bottom of the document’s last page; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.ReportFooterStyle

summary.para: Gets or sets the style applied to the footer of the printed report.

member.value: The style applied to a footer of the printed report.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.ReportFooterText

summary.para: Gets or sets the text of the report’s footer.

member.value: The text of the report’s footer.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.ReportHeaderStyle

summary.para: Gets or sets the style applied to a header of the printed report.

member.value: The style applied to a header of the printed report.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.ReportHeaderText

summary.para: Gets or sets the text of the report’s header.

member.value: The text of the report’s header.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.TopMarginStyle

summary.para: Gets or sets the style applied to the top margin of the printed document.

member.value: The style applied to the top margin of the printed document.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.TopMarginText

summary.para: Gets or sets the text of the document’s top margin.

member.value: The text of the document’s top margin.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.Link.VerticalContentSplitting

summary.para: Gets or sets whether content bricks outside the right page margin should be split across pages or moved to the next page.

member.value: The VerticalContentSplitting mode.

summary.para: The base class for all printing links.
Creates a document from the link.

member.name: M:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.LinkBase.CreateDocument(System.Boolean)

summary.para: Creates a document from the link. Optionally, you can access the document pages as soon as they are created. Document creation is always synchronous and does not occur in a background thread.

member.param: true to enable accessing document pages progressively as they are created; otherwise false.

summary.para: Occurs when the document was successfully created.
Occurs when the document creation has been started.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.LinkBase.CustomPaperSize

summary.para: Gets or sets a size of custom paper (in hundredths of an inch).

member.value: The size of custom paper (in hundredths of an inch).

summary.para: Disposes the object. The method releases all the resources allocated to the object and improves system performance.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.LinkBase.DocumentName

summary.para: Gets or sets the document name.

member.value: The document name.

summary.para: Load the specified document.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.LinkBase.Margins

summary.para: Gets or sets the margins of a report page (in hundredths of an inch).

member.value: The margins of a report page (in hundredths of an inch).

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.LinkBase.MinMargins

summary.para: Gets or sets the minimum printer margins.

member.value: The minimum printer margins.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.LinkBase.PaperKind

summary.para: Gets or sets the paper type.

member.value: The paper type.

member.name: M:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.LinkBase.Print(System.String)

summary.para: Prints the instance on the default or specified printer.

member.param: The printer’s name (in OS) that should print the .

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.LinkBase.PrintingSystem

summary.para: Gets the Printing System used to create and print a document for this link.

member.value: The Printing System used to create or print a document.

summary.para: Interrupts the document creation.
A link used to print a DevExpress WinUI control or display a print preview.

member.name: M:DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.PrintableLink.#ctor(DevExpress.WinUI.Printing.IPrintable,System.String)

member.param: An object that implements the interface. This is the control that should be printed with the .
